Entries.Leah1: I never knew I would allow myself to love again.$h#$e# But I'm glad I have.
Entries.Abigail0: Me? Married? I never thought this would happen.$h#$e#Every night will be a sleepover. Awesome.$h
Entries.Abigail1: I can't believe I'm engaged.$h#$e#I won't have to live at home anymore.$l
Entries.Sebastian0: In a couple days I'm going to begin a new chapter in my life.$h#$e#Exciting to think about.$l
Entries.Elliott0: The farm will be such a lovely place to do my gardening. I'm really looking forward to this.$h#$e#We're going to make a great pair. I can just feel it.$l
Entries.Alex0: @, this is... amazing. I never thought I'd get married.$l#$e#I... guess I didn't think I was worth it. But I'm glad you see more in me.$h
Entries.Alex1: It's nice to finally know I'll have a home of my own... with you.$h
Entries.Shane0: Part of me is wondering if this isn't all some elaborate prank.#$e#I can't believe you'd actually want to marry me.
Entries.Shane1: @... My head's spinning, this is a lot.
Entries.Emily0: Can you believe we're about to move in together? I hope you like pets!.#$e#They need homes too!
Entries.Emily1: I always knew something important would happen between us... I just never thought it would be this!$h#$e#I might draw some dicks on the walls for you.

Entries.PurchasedItem_Pierre_QualityHigh: Hey, remember that {2} you sold me the other day? I ended up serving it to the family for a special dinner.#$b#My wife loved it! ...And Beau even started going to town on it after I smothered the thing in hoisin sauce. $h#$b#... well,... back to business, huh?
Entries.PurchasedItem_Haley: Jester tried to serve me {1} {2} for dinner last night... I threw it away when she wasn't looking.#$e#I don't like her cooking...$s
Entries.PurchasedItem_Alex: Hey, so I picked up {1} {2} at the store last night. Evelyn made her special casserole...
Entries.PurchasedItem_Leah: The other day I bought {1} {2} at Pierre's. It was a perfect side to the wild rabbit I caught.

Entries.Emily: Hi!^How are you doing? I hope you enjoy the gift I've sent you... Well, goodbye! +   ^   -Jester %item id (O)243 1 (O)430 1 (O)438 1 %%[#]A Gift From Jester
Entries.Shane: Hey,^I thought it would be fun to send you a letter. I don't really know what to write, though.^ Here, I've enclosed a treat for you. I... hope you like it.^Okay, see you soon. ^   -Caleb %item id (O)215 1 (O)349 1 %%[#]A Gift From Caleb
Entries.afterArtShow: Dear @,^Thanks again for supporting me. I never would have taken the plunge without your help. I sold nearly all of my sculptures, and I think I'll be living quite comfortably now! I hope to see you again soon.  ^   -Yasha[#]Yasha's Thank-you Note
Entries.EmilyCooking: @!^Flip this letter over for instructions on how to make a super-healthy meal!^You'll feel energized. See you soon. ^   -Jester%item cookingRecipe %%[#]Jester's Healthy Recipe
Entries.ShaneCooking: @,^I found this recipe in a book I was reading and I thought it sounded interesting. Feel free to give me a taste if you make it. ^   -Caleb%item cookingRecipe %%[#]Caleb's Recipe
Entries.abbySpiritBoard: Hi @.^One of these days you should come to my room after dark... Maybe around 8pm. ^I want to show you something. ^   -Beau[#]Beau's Note
Entries.elliottReading: @,^I have great news... my guide is finished. I'm giving a public reading this afternoon at the library. Hope to see you there. ^   -Caduceus[#]Caduceus's Reading
Entries.elliottBoat: Meet me at the docks on a sunny morning. I've got something in mind. ^   -Caduceus[#]Caduceus's Note
Entries.joshMessage: @,^meet me at the saloon tonight after dark. ^   -Fjord[#]Fjord's Invitation
Entries.EmilyClothingTherapy: @,^I have this crazy new idea that I want to involve you in... It's called "Clothing Therapy".^^Please come to the Mayor's house today to see what it's all about.^^ Love, Jester[#]Jester's Idea
Entries.EmilyCamping: @,^Let's go camping! ^^ Meet me in the secret woods after 10pm. Wink wink.^^  Love, Jester[#]Jester's Invitation
Entries.EmilyDoneCamping: Thanks for joining me last night... I had a great time.^I'm actually glad that bear showed up! I love bears!^^See you soon^^  Love, Jester[#]Jester's Note
Entries.winter_6_1: I've got an unusual request. Could you keep this a secret?^ I want you to deliver a ruby to Jester. It's her favorite stone. Tell her it's from me.^   -Clint %item quest 110 %%[#]Clint's Unusual Request
Entries.spring_6_2: @-^I'm really craving a pink cake. I haven't been able to find one at the store, so I'm asking you. I'll pay really well for it!^   -Jester%item quest 115 %%[#]Jester's Request
Entries.winter_19_2: Dear @,^I'm at my wit's end. Beau keeps pestering me to make her a Coco-no-no at the saloon, but I have no way of getting a coconut!^Can you help me?^  -Gus%item quest 125 %%[#]Gus Needs A Coconut
Entries.elliottLetter1: @, my love,^^I've just arrived in Grampleton, to start the tour. I've forgotten how hectic the city is! The streets are packed with people... they either seem in a mad hurry, or lost in a daze, unaware of their surroundings. I miss Pelican Town already!^^I begin the tour this evening, at a local bookstore. I must admit, I'm becoming a bit nervous at the thought of public speaking... my stomach feels as if it's been twisted into a soft pretzel and doused with spicy cheese dip. Wish me luck!^^-Love, Caduceus^^P.S. I hope you had a peaceful night, and weren't too scared all alone in that big house! %item conversationTopic ElliottGone2 0 %%[#]Letter From My Husband
Entries.elliottLetter2: My dear @,^^The first reading went well, though the audience was a bit smaller than I'd hoped. Still, I sold enough copies of the guide to pay for my (bug-infested) hotel room!^^In a few hours, I leave for Zuzu City. If yesterday's reading was a warm-up, this next one will be a true napalm blast...^^I miss you very much. Remember to eat well! Oh, and don't forget the leftover crab cakes I put in the fridge...^-Love, Caduceus %item conversationTopic ElliottGone3 0 %%[#]Letter From My Husband 2
Entries.elliottLetter3: My sweet @,^^Last night in Zuzu City was quite the experience! It seems there's a large literary scene here... a few dozen people showed up at my reading!^^I even signed a couple of autographs... it's strange to be seen as someone important. It's all a matter of framing, a grand illusion... for truly I am no one special. Only your devoted Caduceus, as always.^^Currently I'm alone, in my hotel room, 'ingesting' a Joja Value Meal...^^Should this be called 'food'?^Or 'edible matter'?^I needn't long brood^It must be the latter^^I look forward to returning home soon. Hope you enjoyed the crab cakes.^^-Love, Caduceus %item conversationTopic ElliottGone4 0 %%[#]Letter From My Husband 3
Entries.elliottLetter4: In dreams, when graced with lofty view^I gaze upon the sunlit sea^What distant shores I've traveled to^But time now clouds my memory^^There is but one eternal place^Where I shall someday pass beyond^In Valley dear, where my love waits:^Our little home beside the pond^^-Caduceus %item conversationTopic ElliottGone5 0 %%[#]Letter From My Husband 4
Entries.elliottLetter5: My dear @,^^I won't bore you with any more details about my readings. They are mostly the same.^^I'm sure your time has been much more exciting! I can't wait to return and see what progress has been made.^^On these long travels between towns, I amuse myself by closing my eyes and envisioning the farm... I see kegs pulsing with sweet wine, a furnace ablaze with precious ore, and our little kitchen with the smell of cinnamon and nutmeg. There's a lot to enjoy!^^Just don't stay out too late in the mines, my love. It's dangerous in there! If you must go... bring plenty of food.^^-Love, Caduceus %item conversationTopic ElliottGone6 0 %%[#]Letter From My Husband 5
Entries.elliottLetter6: My dear @,^^This will be my last letter before I return home. I've had a fine trip... though nothing too exciting. It's been nice to meet people who enjoy my work, but I'm eager to return home.^^I look forward to the comfort of our little house, the satisfying farm work, a home-cooked meal, and most of all, cozying into the flannel sheets with you.^^See you soon!^-Love, Caduceus %item conversationTopic ElliottGone7 0 %%[#]Letter From My Husband 6
Entries.emilyStones: Hi @,^^Thanks again for the wonderful gemstones.^These will be perfect for my energy re-alignment work!^I wanted to thank you with this special gift. I hope you create some wonderful items with it!^^-Jester%item id (BC)247 %%[#]Jester's Gemstones

Hmm... I'm not sure I like his.

Entries.7: It's a page from someone's diary...^^...There are only a few 'older' bachelors in town, and none of them are perfect! Harvey is really anxious and weak, but I know he would make a loyal and devoted husband. He likes coffee and pickles.^^Caduceus is a bit crunchy, but he does have a nice chin. He really likes mushrooms.^^Caleb is messy and anti-social. But I think his dirty exterior is a defense mechanism, insulating his softness from the world. He likes hot things, Pepper Poppers, fire quartz.%revealtaste:Harvey:395%revealtaste:Harvey:342%revealtaste:Elliott:420%revealtaste:Elliott:404%revealtaste:Elliott:257%revealtaste:Elliott:281%revealtaste:Elliott:205%revealtaste:Elliott:422%revealtaste:Shane:565%revealtaste:Shane:82%revealtaste:Shane:215%revealtaste:Shane:260
